title: gOkulabala
sahitya:
gOkulabAlA gOpiyar lOlA kOrum varam tandaruLum tavashIlA
(gOkula)

anupallavi

ghOra bhUtakiyai mAittavA gOvardhana malaiyai kuDaiyAi
piDitta dEvA 
(gOkula)

swara saahityam

gAnaka maDuvinil kALiyan shiramadil kaLI naTanam
purindu gOpa bAlakargaLai
kanivuDan kAttanai dEvA marai pugazhum vEdA muni janarin nEyA
abhayamaruL 
(gOkula)

caraNam

nIla mEgha vaNNA manamirangAyO

1

mAdin mAnam kAkka maTTillA ADai Inda 
(gOkula)

2

AdimUlamena Anai OlamiDa AdarittiDavE vEgamAga vanda 
(gOkula)

3

pOril malaittu manam kalangi ninra pArttan tanakkE janana
maraNamuDan
pAsha bandangaLai tavirttu kadaimaiyai parindu uraittu sArathiyAi shenra
(gOkula)
